entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mount Forest
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 01:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Temperature: -3.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -5.0°C
Wind: SW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
